Dialogs.Dialog: Rinko
Oh, by the way. Did you have your first dream this year？
No, I haven't....
I had a dream that I went on a date with ▲小早川＊▲.
Oh, I see. I haven't seen Rinko, so I thought I'd at least listen.
Well, you'll see it next year, right？
That's the thing...I'll just say it. The thing is... I wonder if you would see it because you like it.
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. This coldness... Don't you think it's impossible？
Even if you say it's impossible. It's winter.
Who decided that winter is cold？ It's oppressing. There's nothing good about being cold.
Isn't it romantic when it snows？
When it's cold, we can warm each other up, right？
What, are you trying to be a romantic？ .... That might be a good idea. ....But I don't like cold.
What, you want to hold hands ....？ I don't mind, either. Here, my hand.
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. You know those plum trees that bloom by the road to school？ It's just down a side street.
Plum trees .... I hadn't noticed that at all.
Here's a quiz for you. Do you know the language of plum blossoms？
A noble heart！
Plums are delicious！
That's a good one. I just found out about it yesterday.
By the way, even though the plum trees are blooming, it's still cold. Ah... still... it's cold, cold！
Rinko
The rows of cherry trees behind the school. The other day, I saw them from the window of the school building. Now is the best time to see them.
I see. It's a good place for cherry blossom viewing because only students go near there.
And so... One of my friends from class wants to see you. She said we should go flower viewing all together.
No, I want to be alone with you！
I don't mind if you just show your face
No way！ .... What are you arguing about？ You're an old man, heh！
Ah, you're embarrassed. Well, even if you really come... I'm embarrassed too.
That's a lot of yawning... Maybe it's boring？
Rinko
No, I'm just sleepy. It's been getting warmer lately. It's hard to get up in the morning.
That's true. I often get sleepy in class too.
Is that so？ I wonder why I'm so sleepy like this.
In spring, one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn.
Because▲小早川＊▲ appears in my dreams....
That's not the reason.... Don't say that with a smug look on your face！
That's your reason？ I don't think it applies to Rinko. It only comes out once in a while.
Rinko
Ah, there was a flower bed here. These tiny flowers are so cute ....
▲小早川＊▲Do you like flowers？
It's a little exccessive...but... .... what kind of flowers would suit Rinko？
Gorgeous flowers！
Neat and clean flowers？
Well, that's a little surprising. Gorgeous, huh？ .... That's a good way to put it, right？
I'm a little unsure myself, but I don't feel bad about it.
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. I was looking at my calendar, and... I've just realized a very important fact.
What was that？ You didn't cancel our date, did you？
If you did, you'd be kicked immediately. That's not what I meant. The year is already half over. Don't you think .... it's too soon？
That's how full it was！
We still have half of it left！
I see, .... Ah, so... Is it your fault that it went so fast？ Yeah, I'll just kick you after all.
Oh, I like your positive attitude. No, no, no. You need to learn from me！
Rinko
Summer vacation？ I thought it would be a long one, but it went by in a flash.
Haven't you had enough fun yet？
Well, yeah .... But other than that... Have you done your homework yet？
Of course I turned it in！
No way. ▲小早川＊▲....
Hmmm. If you hadn't already, you would be an idiot. Even though Rinko finished it seriously.
Too bad, Rinko is perfect. You're not the one who said that, are you？
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. Have you gotten ready for a change of clothes？ It's already time to switch to winter clothes.
I see, .... It's already autumn, isn't it？
What's with that faraway look？ What are you thinking about？
In autumn, girls can't wear light clothing anymore！
I miss the memories of summer.
That sucks！ If it was "girlfriend" instead of "girl", it would be even cuter！
Yeah, well, ....I'm sure you'll make lots of new memories in the fall. Especially if we are together.
Rinko
So, you finished changing your clothes. It's already fall. Am I right？
It's already fall on the calendar, too.
Why is it so hot then？ It's abnormal weather, isn't it？ Global warming is serious.
You're exaggerating.
Are you getting eco-conscious？
It's that kind of thinking that ruins the environment. It's not that I don't like that kind of thing though.
No, Instead of keeping the air conditioner on high, you'll have to put up with it instead. Please save energy.
Rinko
About October... In the lunar calendar, it's the tenth month, right？
A month without gods, right？
Did you know that？ Are you good at old Japanese literature？
ari, ori, haberi, imasokari！
I'm just rich in miscellaneous knowledge
Ah, that's it, Imasokari. I don't know what it means, but I remember it.
Even if I can't study something... if you know it, you look smart. That's the way to do it ....
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. I thought it was cold this morning. The puddle in front of my house was frozen over.
It's suddenly gotten really cold. It's already winter.
I don't like the cold, but isn't the crispy sound of stepping on that thin ice fun？
Isn't it a little childish？
I know the feeling！
It's okay. These things are not childish. It's called innocence！
Isn't that right？ It's just a little refreshing fun.
Rinko
There are many animal shows on TV. I think it's easy to do.
Easy？
I thought if I put baby animals out there, people would be like awwwww.
You can get ratings too. ....
So, ▲小早川＊▲ wouldn't you watch it？
Oh dear, it's tough being an adult. Your father is having a hard time with the ratings.
I never said that. I'm sorry, but... Animal babies are foul.
Rinko also would go awwww.
Rinko
What's your favorite animal？ I never asked you, did I？
Did I mention that？
Just answer for the time being. It's an investigation.
I like dogs
I like cats
Hmm. Well, It's a matter of taste. It's not that I don't like dogs.
Really？ I hope I'm not forcing it.
Now then... Next time I see a cat, I'll let you fluff it.
Rinko
My parents are making plans for a playdate. But you know what？ The destination is the zoo. What do you think about it？ ....
Well, it's good, isn't it？ It would be fun to go there with the family.
Well, what kind of places？
They're recreating ecosystems and everything！
I like being able to interact with them directly！
Hmm, you mean I can learn？ Well, I don't want my brother to hate studying like Rinko.
I see.... definitely. It's like a family gathering. Well, I guess I'll go along with you.
Rinko
Lately,I've been pointed at a lot in English class. I'm pretty sure they're trying to make an enemy out of me！
Did something happen with the English teacher？

Once, he complimented me on my English pronunciation. And because of that, every time I had to read the textbook. Just because I listen to Western music, people think I can speak English. It's annoying.
Every time...That's tough...
But, I think that's a good thing.
Right？ I just like English songs. Just because I like English songs doesn't mean I like English class.
I don't feel bad about being complimented, but it's also hard to keep up with expectations.
Rinko
The other day, a young, beautiful woman came to the staff room. But. Hey, who do you think it was？
Hmm, I don't know.
She's a former student of the school. It seems she's going to come to our school for teaching practice soon.
A teacher.... I think I'd like that.
▲小早川＊▲ a teacher！
You might be more suited to be a teacher than you think.
.... what？ You might be a better teacher than you think, Rinko. No homework, no tests, and you'll be very popular with the students.
I was just kidding. .... But if you become a teacher, you can't skip class.
Rinko
Why do we have uniforms？ How many inches is the skirt length？ It's a bit annoying.
Isn't it the guidance counselor who's so picky？ It's true that there are school rules, but they're a little too detailed.
They don't say much to the boys, you know.
Oh, I wish we could go to school in plain clothes. Don't you think so？
I'd rather go to school in plain clothes
I'd rather have uniforms
Well, it's easier. You can see all kinds of girls！
.... Oh, you have a fetish like that？ Please don't look at me like I'm weird, okay？
Rinko
Recently, it seems that more and more students are making their own lunches.
Is ▲小早川＊▲ not happy？
Rinko's special seat in the courtyard. Lately, it's been occupied by a couple.
It's a precious place where you can read a book in peace. They're just flirting at school.
Why don't you let them have lunch break？
Why don't we try flirting too？
Ummm .... Ah, no, not at all. I'm in trouble if you're flirting beside me.
No！ It's like I'm being swept along. No. If we wanted to do this, I wouldn't hesitate.
Rinko
People often lend and borrow notebooks before exams, don't they？
I do, I do. I get a copy of a serious person's notebook.
I have a friend who takes notes very clearly and neatly. I wonder if they just have a sense for it.
What do you think？ It's even easier to understand than a reference book.
That's something I'll never be able to imitate.
It's enough if you understand it yourself
Why don't you try to write carefully？
Oh, I see. If the notes you show me are clean That's fine.
It's not dirty even now. That's right, let me see your notebook too. Just for reference, you know.
Kohayakawa
It seems that my friend has started a diet. So, you know, I don't have to go on a diet. She told me she was jealous.
It's true that Kobayakawa loves junk food, but doesn't get fat at all.
Hmm... Rinco is just acting normal. Why is everyone so desperate？
It's better not to say too much about it
You want to be as beautiful as possible
.... too late for that advice. I got a lot of bashing when I said it. It's not easy.
I don't think losing weight is the same as becoming beautiful. You only take care of your appearance in the first place. Right？
Rinko
My friend is having trouble with his girlfriend. They don't want to break up, but they don't know what is the best thing to do.
Ummm ....
The girl's boyfriend says that men are cheaters. You're not ....are you？
I'm not so sure about ....！
I would never cheat on you！
！？ ....Are you asking to be punished with kicks？ No unfunny jokes！
Hmm, alright. Hehe... I'll be by your side for a long time to come. From now on, you'll always be there, right？
Rinko
I had an argument with my friend yesterday about which flavor of potato chips is the best.
You fought about something like that？
It's impossible that consommé flavor is the best. Lightly salted is the best. The simplicity of the ingredients is important.
● likes all flavors
▲小早川＊▲ is a maniac
If you say that, it's over. There are some things in this world that are black and white！
Well, I guess you're right. Does that mean Rinco is not up with the times ？
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. Is it better to have many friends？
What's wrong？
Not really, but you say it a lot. Let's make lots of friends.
.... Well, that's what most adults say.
There are a few kids who I talk to a lot, but .... I don't know about "many.
I don't think the number is what matters
Sometimes I get anxious too
That's right. That's what I thought, too. If you say so, then it's OK.
I see. I'm a little relieved. Even if I get anxious, If I'm not alone, I'm fine.
Rinko
The other day. I went to karaoke with my friends. .... Ah, God.
What's wrong？
When I told them I wanted Western music, they refused.
I guess they don't like songs they don't know.
It's a chance to meet new great songs. Everyone is too conservative.
▲小早川＊▲ is a radical.
Wouldn't it be nice if you asked ▲ to join us
Yes. Culture is something to be actively enjoyed. If you only listen to things that come in randomly It rots your senses.
Yes .... Because I have some songs I practice .... I'll become better at it, right？
You look like you're in a good mood. What's going on？
Rinko
At the arcade in front of the station, I met a strong opponent.
Ah, a fighting game？
And he was the same age as Rinko. After all, if there are more rivals, I can become stronger.
Sorry .... I can't be your rival
Is your rival a man？
I know you're not perfect. But a perfect boyfriend would be good, right？
Even though I'm a girl？ Oh ....hmm, is that what you mean？ I wonder if any male rivals will show up？
Rinko
Recently, I've been addicted to online auctions again. It's really exciting.
Auctions, huh？ Sounds interesting.
It's all about tactics. It's a bit like fighting in a fighting game.
What are you aiming for now？
What's your biggest loot？
Killer Bumbies bootleg. .... I mean, I want it, But, after all... It's bad for the artists.
God of Guitars, Is there a God Mt. pic？ It's so fresh and shaved~！
Rinko
I've been going to the city library lately. It's much better than I expected.
The library seems to have more books than the school.
It's not just the number, but also the quality.
ehh....
Lately. I've been trying to read original fairy tales. It's not so easy at the school library.
You're very studious
Fairy tales？ That's unexpected
It's something I like to do. That's why I didn't think of it as studying.
I like fairy tales a lot, though.
I just don't want to be misunderstood, so I don't tell people.
Rinko
My friend's boyfriend He's into martial arts lately.
Then I talked with ▲小早川＊▲
It's not that I am a martial arts fan.
But my friend misunderstood me. She asked me if I wanted to go on a double date with her at an upcoming martial arts event.
Wouldn't that be fun？
I'm worried that▲小早川＊▲ might get out of control...
Really？ But .... It's not so much about martial arts. it's about the double date. I'm kind of nervous about it.
If you want, you can go wild now. Okay？ Come on, let's go kick it out, okay？
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. Why are movies the standard date？
Because it's easier to find common ground. Isn't that right？ Especially when you just started dating.
Hmm, a safe answer. So, what is the best movie for the beginning of a relationship？
Laugh at comedies！
Love movies of course！
You have a point. We need to create a fun atmosphere first. If you get a bad movie, it's a disaster.
Another safe answer. But I don't like it because it shows an ulterior motive.
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. Hey, after all... Do you think it's better to have a girly girlfriend？
What？ What's wrong？
My friend's boyfriend said so. So, I was wondering what you think.
Is ▲小早川＊▲ girly？
Other people are other people！ ● is ●！
...., if anyone other than you says that.... "Don't say something like that！" And kick.
But you really know me well. I'm happy.
I see, .... well. whatever. I don't care anymore！

SDL2.Dialogs: ○○○○○○○○ There's a new ice cream shop in front of the station. The girls in our class were making a fuss about it. Rinko Oh, I know！ The place they sing, dance, and perform, right？ Yea, yea, I'd like to go there. But I heard it's popular and there's a long line. Should we wait a while and go after things settle down？ Let's do it, let's get in line！ Yeah, I don't like jumping on the bandwagon right away. If I have to wait in line for hours, I'd rather go to a convenience store and buy ice cream to eat. What？ Wait in line. That's bad, right？ I'm kidding.... If it's the two of us, the time we spend in line is fun too.>

Dialogs.Dialog: Rinko
My favorite one piece is too tight. I'm in shock.
Hmm... It's too bad, but it can't be helped.
That's the one you complimented me on before. I've got fond memories of it. ....
It's a sign of growth, so be happy！
Let's make some new memories！
Well, I see. Even if you can't wear it anymore, you can still keep it！
.... That's really positive. Now that you've said it, will you do it properly？ I'll be expecting it.
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. Hey, do you know how to write a love letter？
What？
My friend wants to confess her feelings. But she's too embarrassed to confess in person. It's impossible.
She should think about it on her own
A direct confession is better. Like▲小早川＊▲
Right. Yeah, I know. I thought I would at least ask. But I guess I will tell them that after all.
！？ This has nothing to do with Rinko！ .... Idiot.
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. Did you know that the arcade in front of the station has a new fighting game？
Hmm, I didn't know.
That's it Rinko's boyfriend is disqualified, right？ There is a new shield cancel, but... Are you listening to me？
Yes, I'm listening.
Yeah. Maybe you don't like fighting games？ If you don't like it, I won't talk to you about it anymore....
I'm not that interested
I like it, but it's too technical for me to talk about....
You're right. It's no fun when you're always losing.
Okay, that's it, let's train. If we do that, it'll be more interesting！
Well, it's just a lack of training. Oh well, It can't be helped. I'll train you. Anyway, for the time being, I'll work on that new one.
Rinko
In PE, we were playing softball. And my friend said that I can only throw about 10 meters.
Even elementary school kids can throw further....
Right？ No matter how bad you are at sports, You're too soft on her. You have to get serious.
Oh, you're unusually motivated！
Get back at them with a good record！
Yes, unusually so.. If I look back at them and I'll just do it normally.
Now that you mention it, I'm feeling a little less confident. .... will you come with me to practice？
Rinko
My mom is going to her younger brothers home for a little while. So, Rinko announced that she would take care of all the housework. On the spur of the moment.
I wonder if▲小早川＊▲ is that good at housework. ....？
....Perhaps. Well, Rinko's father says she doesn't have to do anything.
Your father is right
This is a good opportunity to train as a bride！
The way you say it, makes me angry. .... But well, let's start with the laundry. I'll start with the laundry. Hm.. And cooking...
.... are you expecting something？ Don't you think bridal training is a bit prehistoric？
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲.
Hmm？ What？
What's with you all of a sudden？ What did you do？
Nothing, nothing. If there is something wrong, I would say it.
wha-t...., just kidding, just kidding.
Hmm, that's the second time.
I don't know. How many times do you call someone's name？ I understand the depth of my love. But do I really understand or not？
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲. Did you ever think about the origin of your name？
Well, I guess so... ....
I've never bothered with it
I was curious. I've asked my parents about it
Hmm... Is that what boys do？
Well, tell me about it.
▲小早川＊▲, Call ●.
Rinko
▲主人公＊▲.
Yes, I'm happy！
▲小早川＊▲！
Yes, yes. That's what I thought it would be.
I'll call you without saying a word. Rinko is so kind. ▲主人公＊▲.
What is that, playing at being a couple？ Sometimes you want to do that kind of thing, don't you？ Is that a male trait？
